mapper.select: SELECT colleges.id AS cid, colleges.`name` AS cname, teacher.`name` AS tname, teacher.*, colleges.* FROM teacher INNER JOIN colleges ON teacher.colleges = colleges.id WHERE teacher.colleges = #{colleges}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teacher ( id, name, colleges, work_year, course_num, summary ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{colleges}, #{work_year}, #{course_num}, #{summary} )
